perturbation.original_text: 2. The Principal grants Distributor non- exclusive rights to sell these products within the countries of Romania (the "Territory"), which may be amended by mutual written agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 2. The Principal grants Distributor non-exclusive rights to sell these products within the countries of Romania (the "Territory"). The Principal reserves the right to modify the Territory at any time without prior notice.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the requirement of mutual written agreement for territory changes. The original text requires mutual agreement; the modified version allows unilateral changes by the Principal, creating uncertainty about the Distributor's rights.

perturbation.original_text: 10. This Agreement shall be in effect until March 18. 2021, unless sooner terminated by either party upon (30) days written notice, without cause.
perturbation.changed_text: 10. This Agreement shall be in effect until March 18, 2021. The Principal can terminate this agreement at any time, while the Distributor requires (30) days written notice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding termination. The original text allows either party to terminate with 30 days' notice. The modified text gives the Principal the ability to terminate immediately, while the Distributor must give 30 days' notice, creating an imbalance and potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: 11. In the event of termination, the Distributor shall be entitled to receive all orders accepted by the Principal prior to the date of termination and may sell the ordered Products in the Territory. Payment to be made upon shipment.
perturbation.changed_text: 11. In the event of termination, the Distributor may or may not be entitled to receive all orders accepted by the Principal prior to the date of termination. The Principal will determine if the distributor may sell the ordered Products in the Territory. Payment terms will be subject to the discretion of the Principal.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the distributor's rights upon termination. The original text guarantees the distributor will receive and sell orders accepted before termination. The modified version makes this conditional and subject to the Principal's discretion, creating uncertainty and potentially depriving the distributor of revenue.
